bibl.title: The Derveni Papyrus: Problems of Edition, Problems of Interpretation.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. Main problems. - 2. Solutions adopted in the edition of the Theogony. - 3. Prose statements about rites. - 4. Theogony and commentary. - 5. Religious rite and philosophical interpretation.

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007

bibl.seg: BERNABÉ Alberto, The Derveni Papyrus: Problems of Edition, Problems of Interpretation.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 77-83.

1. Introduction. Main problems. - 2. Solutions adopted in the edition of the Theogony. - 3. Prose statements about rites. - 4. Theogony and commentary. - 5. Religious rite and philosophical interpretation.
